name: Fisher-Price Wood Toddler Toy Rock-a-Stack, 8-Piece Wooden Ring Stacking Activity for Fine Motor Skill Development Kids Ages 18+ Months
short_description: ​Classic activity toy with 7 colorful wooden ring stackers and a roly-poly stacking base ​
​Toddlers can sort and stack the rings from biggest to smallest, or use the rings for endless imaginative stories ​
​Wobbly stacking base helps introduce cause & effect ​
​Made with wood from Forest Stewardship Council-certified sources (FSC-N004566) and decorated with non-toxic, water-based paints ​
​This toy helps foster fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and thinking skills for toddlers and preschool kids ages 18 months and older ​
product_description: ​The iconic Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack toy is reimagined in colorful wood for toddler stacking fun! The Wooden Rock-a-Stack activity toy features a roly-poly base and 7 colorful rings for kids to grasp, sort and stack from biggest to smallest. Made with wood from Forest Stewardship Council-certified sources (FSC-N004566) and decorated with non-toxic, water-based paints, this wooden stacking toy helps foster fine motor skills, problem solving, and imaginative play. Colors and decorations may vary.
product_details: Manufacturer recommended age 18 months and up
